p: Saami reindeer herding is distinctively inherited profession and kin-ties are important for reindeer management. [ 32]. Reindeer herding is connected to Saami well-being so that the quality of life decrease if the livelihood is lost [ 33]. Women constitute a minority of full-time reindeer herders, being actively involved in reindeer-herding culture [ 34••]. Evidence from Sweden suggests that there are gender differences in the status of reindeer herder, and different expectations for women [ 35].
